textBeforeTable: > W V T P I E C A < Other Submissions by EBFan2000 I say that EB0 just may be the way to save the Earthbound hype. So, if you haven't signed the Mother on Game Boy Color petition, I suggest that you do it. Earthbound Zero would not only be a great game to play, but it just might be the way to build up enough hype so that Nintendo finally finished EB64. Now what, you may ask, does this have anything to do with Earthbound. Well Earthbound has a prequel that is unreleased in the US. What I am trying to say is that maybe Earthbound Zero is the way to go. Faithful Earthbound fans (mostly the ones that don't believe in roms) would like to know how Earthbound all started. Over 20 years ago wone of the biggest movies ever was created. It involved a futuristic myth that happened a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away. This movie
